name: Phaser (AdrKacz)
description:
Phaser

Submission for Trijam 156

The world's going way too fast. Hopefully, there's tea time: a little break to slow things down  💭 

Jump from circle to circle to phase all of them! Don't jump into orange ones, or you'll explode 💥

Your space bar is all your need in this (too) fast world 🌍 

Credits

Thanks, Dad for the music 🎶
